<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3</value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns parent of an object if the object is proxy, otherwise [[objNull]]. In case of backpack, the parent is a weaponholder or a cargo space of a vehicle or the unit carrying it. Unit in a vehicle will return the vehicle as parent.<br><br>
Another good use of [[objectParent]] is when a static weapon is known and one needs to check if it is assembled or not. <tt>[[objectParent]] _staticWeapon</tt> will return [[objNull]] if weapon is unpacked, or backpack object if packed.<br><br>
[[Image:objectParent.jpg|600px]]
<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> When used on a soldier, if the soldier is in a vehicle, this command will return soldier's vehicle. Apart from being faster than [[vehicle]] command, it is also more reliable, as when used on dead [[crew]] inside a vehicle, it returns the vehicle object, where as [[vehicle]] command may surprisingly return unit object instead. For example, to delete a unit which is in a vehicle, execute:
<code>[[objectParent]] _unit [[deleteVehicleCrew]] _unit;</code></value></part></template>
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''objectParent''' object </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_weaponholder = [[objectParent]] _mybackpack;
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Create and place created backpack in front of player:<code>_backpackContainer = "B_TacticalPack_rgr" [[createVehicle]] [0,0,0];
_weaponHolder = [[objectParent]] _backpackContainer;
_weaponHolder [[setPos]] ([[player]] [[modelToWorld]] [0,5,0]);</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Check if player is on foot:<code>_isOnFoot = [[isNull]] [[objectParent]] [[player]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> Detect if player is in commander turret of a vehicle:<code>_isVehicleCommander = [[player]] [[isEqualTo]] [[commander]] [[objectParent]] [[player]];</code></value></part><part><name/>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[backpackContainer]], [[unitBackpack]], [[backpack]], [[backpackCargo]], [[getBackpackCargo]], [[backpackItems]], [[addBackpack]], [[addBackpackCargo]], [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[removeBackpack]], [[clearBackpackCargo]], [[clearBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[clearAllItemsFromBackpack]], [[loadBackpack]], [[backpackSpaceFor]], [[canAddItemToBackpack]], [[addItemToBackpack]], [[removeItemFromBackpack]], [[everyBackpack]], [[vehicle]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
